title: All the Shades of Shane - Blissful Misery
description: A unique autobiography of a young man’s past. His black cloud that follows over his head no matter where he goes, who he was with and how it travels with him. From outrageous trips, sexual desires, blind dates (gone wrong), growing up, trying to save a life and so much more. All true but will be hard to believe. While it shares his life misfortunes that has been shared in person or the stories between those chapters, this is a must read if you like something ‘unique’. This will take you bit by bit as it jumps around a little from one point to another, so follow along on this uncommon events of the past.
author: S.K. Ballinger
